# EEå†…ç½®æ’åº

é’ˆå¯¹å­—æ®µçš„æ’åº,EEæä¾›äº†ä¸€äº›å†…ç½®å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨çš„APIï¼Œç”¨äºæ”¯æŒå‡åºæ’åºå’Œé™åºæ’åº:

// é™åºæ’åˆ—
wrapper.orderByDesc(æ’åºå­—æ®µ,æ”¯æŒå¤šå­—æ®µ)
    
// å‡åºæ’åˆ—
wrapper.orderByAsc(æ’åºå­—æ®µ,æ”¯æŒå¤šå­—æ®µ)
    
// æ ¹æ®å¾—åˆ†æ’åº(æ­¤åŠŸèƒ½0.9.7+ç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¯æŒ;ä¸æŒ‡å®šSortOrderæ—¶é»˜è®¤é™åº,å¾—åˆ†é«˜çš„åœ¨å‰,æ”¯æŒå‡åº/é™åº)
wrapper.sortByScore(boolean condition,SortOrder sortOrder)
    
// æ’åºå…¥å‚ç”±å‰ç«¯ä¼ å…¥, å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ ¼å¼,æœ‰ç‚¹ç±»ä¼¼ä¹‹å‰MySQLé‚£ç§

// æ’åºå…¥å‚ç”±å‰ç«¯ä¼ å…¥,å¤šå­—æ®µæƒ…å½¢

    @Test
    public void testSort(){
        // æµ‹è¯•æ’åº ä¸ºäº†æµ‹è¯•æ’åº,æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨Documentå¯¹è±¡ä¸­æ–°å¢äº†åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´å­—æ®µ,æ›´æ–°äº†ç´¢å¼•,å¹¶æ–°å¢äº†ä¸¤æ¡æ•°æ®
        LambdaEsQueryWrapper<Document> wrapper = new LambdaEsQueryWrapper<>();
        wrapper.likeRight(Document::getContent,"æ¨");
        wrapper.select(Document::getTitle,Document::getGmtCreate);
        List<Document> before = documentMapper.selectList(wrapper);
        System.out.println("before:"+before);
        wrapper.orderByDesc(Document::getGmtCreate);
        List<Document> desc = documentMapper.selectList(wrapper);
        System.out.println("desc:"+desc);
    }

    @Test
    public void testSortByScore(){
        // æµ‹è¯•æ ¹æ®å¾—åˆ†å‡åºæ’åˆ—(åˆ†æ•°ä½çš„æ’å‰é¢)
        LambdaEsQueryWrapper<Document> wrapper = new LambdaEsQueryWrapper<>();
        wrapper.match(Document::getContent,"æŠ€æœ¯");
        wrapper.sortByScore(SortOrder.ASC);
        List<Document> documents = documentMapper.selectList(wrapper);
        System.out.println(documents);
    }

    @Test
    public void testOrderByParams(){
        // æ­¤å¤„æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå‚æ•°ç”±å‰ç«¯é€šè¿‡xxQueryç±»ä¼ å…¥,æ’åºæ ¹æ®æ ‡é¢˜é™åº,æ ¹æ®å†…å®¹å‡åº
        String jsonParam = "[{\"order\":\"title\",\"sort\":\"DESC\"},{\"order\":\"creator\",\"sort\":\"ASC\"}]";
        List<OrderByParam> orderByParams = JSON.parseArray(jsonParam, OrderByParam.class);
        LambdaEsQueryWrapper<Document> wrapper = new LambdaEsQueryWrapper<>();
        wrapper.match(Document::getContent,"æŠ€æœ¯")
                .orderBy(orderByParams);
        List<Document> documents = documentMapper.selectList(wrapper);
        System.out.println(documents);
    }

ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹:

    @Test
    public void testSort(){
        // æµ‹è¯•å¤æ‚æ’åº,SortBuilderçš„å­ç±»éå¸¸å¤š,è¿™é‡Œä»…æ¼”ç¤ºä¸€ç§, æ¯”å¦‚æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·æå‡ºéœ€è¦éšæœºè·å–æ•°æ®
        LambdaEsQueryWrapper<Document> wrapper = new LambdaEsQueryWrapper<>();
        wrapper.match(Document::getContent,"æŠ€æœ¯");
        Script script = new Script("Math.random()");
        ScriptSortBuilder scriptSortBuilder = new ScriptSortBuilder(script, ScriptSortBuilder.ScriptSortType.NUMBER);
        wrapper.sort(scriptSortBuilder);
        List<Document> documents = documentMapper.selectList(wrapper);
        System.out.println(documents);
    }
